字幕内容: Timur: We’ve been spotted by Wei kingdom thieves!
Qi Yan: Uncle Timur
Buqin: Timur
字幕颜色: take half of our people and escort the Princess to the north

字幕内容: the rest will continue to escort the Prince south with me.
Buqin: We’re splitting up!
Even if no one survives
we must keep the last of the great Khan’s bloodline safe!
Got it?
Timur: Understood!
Xiao-Die: Gege
字幕颜色: I don’t want to part with you!

字幕内容: Xiao-Die: Gege
Qi Yan: Xiao-Die!
[Qi Yan's dream]
Qi Yan: Xiao-Die
Qi Yan: I want to take revenge!
The masked person: What revenge do you seek?
Qi Yan: Xiao-Die!
Qi Yan: For the murder of my family!
The masked person: Wrong!
Your family was killed by the Nangong imperial family
the revenge you seek is for the destruction of your kingdom
and the genocide of your people!
The masked person: The land where the corpses of your parents lay exposed
is covered with livestock dung.
They have died with their eyes open.
Do you not wish for the Nangong imperial family
and even the entire kingdom
to pay with their blood?
Qi Yan: I do!
The masked person: Then you must remember these six words—
bear with it
Qi Yan: Yes. I will definitely—
Qi Yan: I will definitely…
sow discord in the false court
turn brother against brother
father against son
Their death wrought by their own hands will be revenge for the destruction of my kingdom and the genocide of my people!
Ding You: Aguna
You have to at least leave a way out for yourself!
Otherwise
you’ll end up as someone neither living or dead
and then it’ll be too late for regrets!
Qi Yan: I have never thought about getting out of this in one piece
so what regret is there to speak of?
Ding You: Aguna!
Qi Yan: I forgot to tell you
Qiyan Aguna no longer exists in this world.
Call me— Qi Yan!
Qi Yan: Ding You
I have an unusual eye color
so I had to falsely claim that it is night-blindness…
I will do anything in order to become an official
and sow discord in the court.
How can someone who cannot see at night gaze upon the starry sky?
Nangong Rang: Hurry
字幕颜色: hurry up and keep that beast away from me

字幕内容: escort
Nangong Rang: That beast has amber eyes!
Guo Qingliu: This subject will boldly offer a prediction…
A remarkable talent for the ages will appear in this year’s palace exam.
Nangong Rang: Qi Yan? …He is the one with the amber eyes?
Nangong Rang: Flower Seeker Qi Yan of the Jin province.
Although one of modest background
you are excellent in both character and learning;
talented and attractive.
I have a beloved lawful daughter
the Zhenzhen Princess
I have decided to have the Zhenzhen Princess married to you.
Qi Yan: The Zhenzhen Princess?!
Thank you
Nangong Jingnu: That person has very special eyes!
It’s the color of amber! I’ve never seen that before!
Nangong Jingnu: Could Qi Yan be the Hermit Shepherd?
Nangong Jingnu: Adapted from
Qi Yan: Jinjiang Literature City’s
Nangong Jingnu: original work by Please Don’t Laugh
Qi Yan: ‘Clear and Muddy Loss of Love’
Nangong Jingnu: Produced by Yinhang Media
broadcasting exclusively on Maoer FM
Together: The first season of ‘Two Adamant Hearts’ audio drama
is coming soon
Street food seller: Selling candied haw
Nangong Jingnu: Qi Yan
字幕颜色: I want to ask you something

字幕内容: you can’t get mad or think too much about it.
Qi Yan: Mm
Nangong Jingnu: What do things look like for you during the night?
Qi Yan: Luminous things are somewhat distinguishable
but anything else appears vague and indistinct
as if covered by a black cloth.
Nangong Jingnu: Then
字幕颜色: can you see those river lamps clearly?

字幕内容: Qi Yan: Mm. At such a distance
Jingnu: Oh
字幕颜色: what about the stars in the sky?

字幕内容: Qi Yan: No.
Nangong Jingnu: Mm… That’s too bad.
Qi Yan: The stars are only inches away
what’s so bad about that?
